updates.title: Google's NotebookLM Deep Research integration and SIMA 2 agent signal a shift toward AI systems that can autonomously conduct complex research and interact with virtual environments, pointing to more sophisticated AI assistants for design workflows in the coming months.

Cursor's massive $2.3 billion funding round just five months after their previous raise indicates explosive growth in AI-powered development tools, with their Composer model likely to influence design-to-code workflows across the industry.

World Labs launches Marble, their first commercial 3D world generation product, accelerating the race toward persistent virtual environments that could transform how designers prototype and visualize spatial experiences.

ElevenLabs' celebrity voice partnerships with Michael Caine and Matthew McConaughey establish new precedents for licensed AI voice generation, suggesting broader adoption of celebrity AI voices in commercial creative projects ahead.

Anthropic's $50 billion data center partnership with Fluidstack signals massive infrastructure investment that should improve Claude's capabilities and availability for design agencies relying on AI-powered creative workflows.
